subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: What was once a fierce rivalry between Yankees and Red Sox catchers — Thurman Munson and Carlton Fisk — has turned friendlier with Jorge Posada and Jason Varitek.
snippet: What was once a fierce rivalry between Yankees and Red Sox catchers — Thurman Munson and Carlton Fisk — has turned friendlier with Jorge Posada and Jason Varitek.
